T02D2407:30b-1: b'a yu sth'a na ro ga pa ri dzny'a na n'a ma /
T02D2407:30b-3: rlung gnas nad kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2407:30b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
T02D2407:30b-5: dge dang mi dge'i chags pas 'khor ba'i gzhi //
T02D2407:30b-6: de dag chags bral rnal 'byor mya ngan 'das //
T02D2407:30b-7: me rlung chags pa'i gnas su gnas 'gyur ba //
T02D2407:30b-8: rlung gi chu gnas g-yo ba'i sems nyid dag / de yis rnam rtog gang yang rim gyis 'gags //
T02D2407:30b-9: dper na chu dang nam mkha'i skyes bu bzhin //
T02D2407:30b-10: me rlung nag pos snang ba 'ded gyur pas //
T02D2407:30b-11: dkar po'i shel ltar la sogs ye shes 'grub //
T02D2407:30b-12: dang po'i yan lag mgo ni gti mug gnas //
T02D2407:30b-13: sngar ltar bsgoms pas de nyid ye shes yin //
T02D2407:30b-14: dbang po lnga la nyi zla'i mig gnyis chags //
T02D2407:30b-15: lus kyi yan lag lte ba'i ye shes ni //
T02D2407:30b-16: chags pa'i 'khor lor srog gi rtsa gnas so //
T02D2407:30b-17: de la zla grangs rtsa ni bcu gnyis la //
T02D2407:30b-18: lus kyi tshad ni 'dom gang gru bzhi yin //
T02D2407:30b-19: 'dzam bu'i gling bzhi gling phran brgyad dag byung //
T02D2407:30b-20: nyi zla'i sgo nas rlung ni yang dag 'byung //
T02D2407:30b-21: lho byang gnyis dag nyi zla'i lam yin te //
T02D2407:30b-22: dbyar zla 'bring po byang gi bar du dgu //
T02D2407:30b-23: dgun zla 'brang bo lha ru shes par bya //
T02D2407:30b-24: ston dpyid gnyis kyi 'bring po nyin mtshan mnyam //
T02D2407:30b-25: da ni rnal 'byor rlung gi grangs la ni //
T02D2407:30b-26: skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig yin te //
T02D2407:30b-27: thun brgyad thun phyed sum brgya drug cu gzhag //
T02D2407:31a-0: lo gcig h'um nyid thig ler @31a * //
T02D2407:31a-2: nyi zla gnyis kyi sgo nas rlung lnga ni //
T02D2407:31a-3: rang nas mi rgyu gzhan nas rgyu ba des //
T02D2407:31a-4: dpal ldan rnal 'byor rlung log na bar 'gyur //
T02D2407:31a-5: da la rlung gi ming dang gnas rnams ni //
T02D2407:31a-6: brtan g-yo bar gnas mkhris rgyas bde gshegs rlung //
T02D2407:31a-7: rim par gti mug chu rlung mgo la rgyu //
T02D2407:31a-8: bad kan skye bas rnal 'byor lha gnas nyams //
T02D2407:31a-9: g-yo ba'i rlung ni gzhan gyi rtsa la rgyu //
T02D2407:31a-10: mdud par chags na drod nyams grang ba ste //
T02D2407:31a-11: chu rlung bar na me rlung gnas pa de //
T02D2407:31a-12: rtsub pa'i rlung 'dzin ngal du ba byas pa'i tshe //
T02D2407:31a-13: drag po'i zhe sdang mthar yang snying rlung ldang //
T02D2407:31a-14: 'dus pa'i gnas su dug gsum rlung 'dus pa //
T02D2407:31a-15: 'dus pa'i nad kyis sems kyi dbang po 'khrul //
T02D2407:31a-16: bde gshegs gnas su mi rgyu gzhan rgyu na //
T02D2407:31a-17: rnal 'byor las kyi nad du shes par gyis //
T02D2407:31a-18: sman dang sman pa rang lus gnas pa la //
T02D2407:31a-19: lus kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi thig le las //
T02D2407:31a-20: sor ni bcu gnyis bcu gnyis steng du ni //
T02D2407:31a-21: bzhi bzhi gnad 'dzin brgyad la sems gtad bya //
T02D2407:31a-23: dbu mar ma chung rlung ni rtsa bzhi ru //
T02D2407:31a-24: bzung bas rnal 'byor mngon rtogs 'di ltar 'char //
T02D2407:31a-25: sa yi rlung gis lus lci sems mi gsal //
T02D2407:31a-26: mi rtag chu rgal zla ba mthong ba dang //
T02D2407:31a-27: chu mig la sogs rtags ni sna tshogs 'byung //
T02D2407:31a-28: rnal 'byor sha rgyas ldan pa shin tu dka' //
T02D2407:31a-29: thang la 'gro bar 'gyur na glo snying brdung //
T02D2407:31a-30: rlung gi rlung ni zin pa'i mngon rtags ni //
T02D2407:31a-31: grang ba skye zhing lus khol thig le 'dzag / pho ba na zhing g-yang za yan lag 'khums //
T02D2407:31a-32: me rlung zin pa'i rtags ni mkhris pa rgyas //
T02D2407:31a-33: sems nyams drod skyes ro stod lci zhing na //
T02D2407:31a-34: rmi ltas mi mthong snang ba dmar po mthong //
T02D2407:31a-35: 'chi rlung g-yang za 'gro 'dod sems mi dga' //
T02D2407:31a-36: rmi rtags 'phur dang lhung dang phrad mi thar //
T02D2407:31a-37: bde gshegs rlung 'dzin sems bde gnyis med gnas //
T02D2407:31a-38: bsus pa'i gegs sel rim bzhin 'di ltar bya //
T02D2407:31a-39: dmigs pas me sbar sa khams bsreg par bya //
T02D2407:31a-40: chu mig brgyad la rnal 'byor rlangs pa 'thul //
T02D2407:31a-41: chu brub sa spyang rlung gi phyag dar bya //
T02D2407:31a-42: tho rangs mi bskyod grang nas btung bar bya //
T02D2407:31b-0: rlung la me bsgom hi rgyu mar @31b chen dril //
T02D2407:31b-1: bem rtol brgyab pas ba spu'i bu ga phye //
T02D2407:31b-2: 'khor lo bsgom zhing grang ba sel bar byed //
T02D2407:31b-3: dbu mar ma chud chu rlung gzhan zhugs na //
T02D2407:31b-4: bad kan na bas bu gnyis dag byed //
T02D2407:31b-5: lus bca' chu 'brub rlangs pa 'thul bar bsam //
T02D2407:31b-6: me rlung gnyis kyis 'byung bar sems gtad do ;
T02D2407:31b-7: / mkhris pa ldang na gangs kyi chu 'bru ba bya //
T02D2407:31b-8: bdud rtsis lus gang gangs nas du ba 'thul //
T02D2407:31b-9: spyi bor bla ma'i bdud rtsi lus la byug //
T02D2407:31b-10: rlung gi rlung ni 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2407:31b-11: byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab //
T02D2407:31b-12: gzhan yang nad rtags nad 'don zhal las shes //
